body.content:
Forgive me if i am bothering you, I found you in one of the international
pages which i immediately prayed over your profile before sending you
email, as i think we can make a lot of difference if we talk , become good
friends in our lord, and see that with greater power, comes greater
responsibility, and i am very sorry for intruding into your privacy, i want
to say a big thank you for reading my message, I am Joyce Donna 67 years
old widow suffering from a disease which is about claiming my life (Cancer
of the breast). Our language or religion might be different but that is not
a barrier. We are still friends, my dear I will advise you to please email
me on (mrsdonnajoyce@gmail.com) so I can pass across the message I have for
you.

Thanks
God bless you

Mrs Joyce Donna

header.subject: Forgive me if i am bothering you
